content: If you are interested in verifying the account , please let me know , we are going to pay 250 DOLLAR per each account.

comments.author: iriblika72
comments.body: thanks a lot for your quick message , i am contacting with you now .

comments.author: iriblika72
comments.body: I already sent you pm , however it is better to explain on this post as well .  So we pay 100 dollar per account which needs verification , such as skrill , neteller,binance so on . I hope that it is clear now . Thank you for your message btcspot .

comments.author: iriblika72
comments.body: Dear Guys ,@@Iximversors899 is a scammer ,  @Iximversors899 was threating me to pay me 50 dollar first in advance, otherwise he was telling me that he puts the bad comment . I told him to do what you would like to do . I pay half once the job is finished and other half once you deliver me the account . If anyone has any questions regarding this , please let me know .

comments.author: LDU QUITO
comments.body: And how do I know that you are going to pay me after doing the work or at least that you put the $100 to escrow

comments.author: iriblika72
comments.body: @Iximversors899 i am going to report you to the mederator , so you will not threat any seller to make a bad comment just because of the seller did not pay you in advance , you will pay your behaviour @Iximversors899. Guys read the comment about @Iximversors899 .

comments.body: I would like to inform you all that we do not take any consideration of people from Usa , if anything changes , i am going to inform you again , thank you so much for all your interests .
